name: Quick Minigolf - Steady Slopes
description:
Play some Quick Minigolf on the Steady Slopes courses. Play with a normal golf ball or create your own personal golf ball and hit the green. Putt your ball up ramps, over gaps, through windmills and wind to score in this fun and sometimes challenging Minigolf game!

Features

  • Two courses to play (front and back 9)
  • Earn 13 medals by completing courses
  • Over 20 different custom ball materials to challenge you
  • Over 40 different custom ball decals
  • Three different power putters, each with their own range of power
  • Ball follows the camera to keep you in the action

Controls

  • Click and drag on ball to take a swing at it, the longer the arrow the more powerful the shot
  • Right click and drag to turn the camera
  • Click the power buttons in the bottom left to switch to a more powerful putter
  • Press space to toggle free camera mode
